api_list.name: Retrieve a Page
api_list.description: Retrieves a Page object using the ID in the request path. This endpoint exposes page properties, not page content.

api_list.name: Retrieve bot's user info
api_list.description:
Retrieve bot's user info
Requirements:
1. Integration Token
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://notion42.p.rapidapi.com/v1/users/me"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "notion42.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Retrieve a database
api_list.description:
Retrieves a Notion database object using the ID. 
Requirements:
1. Integration Token
2. Database ID
See: [Notion integrations guide](https://developers.notion.com/docs/getting-started)

api_list.name: Retrieve a user
api_list.description:
Retrieve a user object using the ID specified in the request path.
Requirements:
1. Integration Token
2. User ID

api_list.name: List all users
api_list.description: Returns a paginated list of user objects for a workspace
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://notion42.p.rapidapi.com/v1/users"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "notion42.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
